Delicately flavoured Tenderstem broccoli, with stems which are prized just as much as the florets.

Soft, unutterably sweet, and brimming with juice. Grab them while their short season lasts.

Good old Gala apples – one of the most reliably sweet and pleasant varieties. Crisp and juicy, with a subtly aromatic flavour.
Fragrant beauties, full of juice – and unwaxed so you can use the zest in your cooking too.
Organic limes, for adding freshness to dressings and zing to cocktails. Unwaxed, so you can use the zest in cooking too.

One of our favourites. This organic prosecco is semi sparkling, light in alcohol and wonderfully fresh.

Organic pork spare rib steaks from the Riverford butchery. Cheaper than a chop or loin, but just as quick and versatile.
Fresh organic pork tenderloin. The pork equivalent of fillet steak – luxurious, lean and tender.

Fresh organic diced lamb from the Riverford butchery. Ready for succulent kebabs, rich curries and fragrant tagines.
